metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3947 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the Icmp6::Recv function in icmp/Icmp6.cc inthe pinger utility in Squid before 3.5.16 and 4.x before 4.0.8 allowsremote servers to cause a denial of service (performance degradation ortransition failures) or write sensitive information to log files via anICMPv6 packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3947` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

squid - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.2
squid-cgi - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.2
squid-common - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.2
squid-purge - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.2
squid3 - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.2
squidclient - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: squid3 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.12-1ubuntu7.2').
